sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"拒绝"之意。
means: refuse ： 语气较重，指态度坚决，肯定无疑的拒绝。
decline ： 指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
reject ： 多指由于某物某事某行为不能让人满意而被当面直截了当地拒绝。
repel ： 作"拒绝"解时，语气比reject强。
deny ： 指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

sentence.Network_en: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract.
They prepared to repel the invaders.
Two like electric charges repel each other.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （ped 儿童+ ) repel v 击退（敌人），使…反感 （puls 脉搏+.
New Concept English 3_百度文库 ... faintly 微细地 repel 排斥 flicker 闪烁.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... repeatedly 重复地 repel 驱除;拒绝 repent 后悔.
《Friends》词汇表B ... australia n. 澳洲, 澳大利亚 repel vt. 击退, 抵制, 使厌恶, 使不愉快 moth n. 蛾, 蛀虫.

list.abs: 民航英语词汇 ... ICE AND RAIN （冰和雨） REPELLENT 防护剂 SPRAY 喷、向……喷射.
repair shop 机修车间repellent 相斥的；防水的；防护剂；防水布replacement reaction 置换反应
石油词汇英语翻译(QR)--石油百科 ... repeller bias 反射极偏压 repeller 反射极 repelling programs 互斥方案.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... repel 击退 repellence 抵抗性 repellency 抵抗性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin repellere, from re- 'back' + pellere 'to drive'

entry.def: When an army repels an attack, they successfully fight and drive back soldiers from another army who have attacked them.

example.ex: They have fifty thousand troops along the border ready to repel any attack.
example.tran: 他们有5万人的部队驻扎在边境，随时准备击退任何进攻。

entry.def: When a magnetic pole repels another magnetic pole, it gives out a force that pushes the other pole away. You can also say that two magnetic poles repel each other or that they repel .

example.ex: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract...
As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
example.tran: 因为这些电子都是带负电荷的，它们会互相排斥。

entry.def: If something repels you, you find it horrible and disgusting.

example.ex: ...a violent excitement that frightened and repelled her.
example.tran: 使她恐惧和厌恶的强烈兴奋感

means.word_mean: 1. cause to move back by force or influence;
2. be repellent to; cause aversion in

auth_sentence.content: Starship Troopers Valiant insects try to repel totalitarian invaders.
auth_sentence.res_content: Starship Troopers Valiant insects try to repel totalitarian invaders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Starship Troopers Valiant insects try to repel totalitarian invaders.

auth_sentence.content: Zimbabwe, Namibia send troops to repel them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zimbabwe, Namibia send troops to repel them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zimbabwe, Namibia send troops to repel them.

auth_sentence.content: French and Malian troops were able to repel the attackers.
auth_sentence.res_content: French and Malian troops were able to repel the attackers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: French and Malian troops were able to repel the attackers.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引起兴趣的,引人注目的;强制的, 强迫的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compel[v.强迫,迫使]+ing表形容词→compelling强迫的→[某事或物]迫使其注意→引人注目的
propel[v.推进]+er表名词→propeller螺旋桨
com共同+pel驱动,推→一起推→强迫
dis分开+pel推→推开→驱除
ex出+pel推→推出去→逐出
im进入+pel推→推进,驱动
pro向前+pel推→向前推
re回+pel推→击退

jushi.english: Like charges repel each other,unlike charges attract.
jushi.chinese: 同性电荷相斥，异性电荷相吸。
